info.title: Internal Access Control
info.description: This is the proxy class which is responsible for letting the API execute internal functions and prevent others from executing closed functions and features.

method.name: internalCall
method.description: Check if the call was internal (SDK Library)

parameter.name: $level
parameter.description: The level of the debug backtrace depth to check for the internal call. The default level is 2, for SDK functions.

method.returndescription: True if the call is internal, false otherwise.

method.name: checkClass
method.description: Checks the trace given for the specified class.

parameter.name: $trace
parameter.description: The execution stack trace as given by the debug_backtrace() function.

parameter.name: $class
parameter.description: The class library which the call must abide.
